name: model-id-cheatsheet
description: Stop your AI agent from hallucinating outdated model names. Instant lookup of correct API model IDs, pricing, and specs for 46 models across 7 providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, xAI, Meta, Mistral, DeepSeek). Auto-updated weekly.

tools.name: list_models
tools.description: Browse and filter models by provider, status, or capability

tools.name: get_model_info
tools.description: Get exact API model ID, pricing, context window, and capabilities for any model

tools.name: recommend_model
tools.description: Get ranked model recommendations for a specific task and budget

tools.name: check_model_status
tools.description: Check if a model ID is current, legacy, or deprecated with replacement suggestions

tools.name: search_models
tools.description: Free-text search across all model fields

resources.description: Full JSON dump of all 46 models

author: aezizhu
